long_description: Aspiring young runners will love the fit, comfort and feel of the ultra-lightweight Nike Free 5.0 road-running shoes. Breathable, supportive and cushioned, they are ideal for logging miles and fun. Lightweight mesh creates a snug, flexible fit that moves with the natural motion of the foot. Injected Phylon midsoles for lightweight cushioning. Deep Nike Free sipes for excellent range of motion and a natural, barefootlike feel. Reinforced outsole rubber on high-wear areas for durability.
short_description: Aspiring young runners will love the fit, comfort and feel of the ultra-lightweight Nike Free 5.0 road-running shoes. Breathable, supportive and cushioned, they are ideal for logging miles and fun.
